text: Tɨkjakel, kɨdek lum awl kul gɨnɨgab ñɨn ak ownɨgab. Ñɨn anɨb ak Klays ne kɨcheki binɨb okok kɨlop kod mɨdebal okok sek, kɨcheki kɨles mɨdebal okok sek, kɨcheki lum awl kod mɨdebal okok sek, kɨlop mɨdupsek tɨg jɨsɨpuk gɨ dɨyokɨnɨgab. Anɨgɨnɨgab ak nɨm, ne binɨb tap tɨtay kod yenɨgab okok mɨdupsek, Bapi God nop agek kod yenɨgab.
